name: IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS跨站脚本漏洞
product: ["IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS 9.7.2.7", "IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS Web Access 9.7.2.7"]
description: IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS是一个需求管理工具。IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS存在跨站脚本漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞在Web UI中嵌入任意JavaScript代码。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://www.ibm.com/support/pages/node/7124058
patch: IBM Engineering Requirements Management DOORS跨站脚本漏洞的补丁
